ceoMessage.title: CEO Message & Team
ceoMessage.description: Read the message from our CEO.

technologyImpact.title: AI-Powered Precision Shade Measurement
technologyImpact.description: With patented algorithms, we define color through data, not perception.

item1.title: Calibration – The Standard of True Color
item1.description: Our proprietary calibration technology quantifies color into precise numerical values.

item2.title: Deep Learning Error Minimization
item2.description: Trained with deep learning algorithms, T-GRID overcomes human limitations and delivers objective data.

item3.title: Certified Solution – T-GRID
item3.description: Backed by 3 patents (including PCT), venture certification, and institutional investment.

item4.title: Color Data Visualization
item4.description: Collected tooth shades are visualized as colormaps, providing data for inventory and research applications.

news.title: Newsroom
news.description: Check out the latest news and events from AnotherDoctor.

team.title: The Team Behind AnotherDoctor
team.description:
Our team of doctors, engineers, and designers
is passionate about building products that support healthier lives.

Joseph.name: Changhee Jung
Joseph.description:
Hello, and thank you for visiting AnotherDoctor.
For over 20 years, I have dedicated myself to delivering the best care for patients. Through AI-driven digital innovation, AnotherDoctor is standardizing clinical capabilities and striving to provide fair medical services to more people.
We ask for your continued support as we grow into a global healthcare platform.
career: Graduated from Seoul National University, School of Dentistry
Completed KAIST AI Business Executive Program
Completed Periodontology Specialist Program, Samsung Medical Center

Sey.name: Sey Kim
Sey.description: I focus on building efficient systems that enhance trust and convenience in clinical settings. Creating an environment where both patients and teams are satisfied is my core value.

Logan.name: Joonho Choi
Logan.description: I am passionate about driving innovation in dental practices through technology. My goal is to help realize the future of smart dentistry.

Lyne.name: Boram Kim
Lyne.description: Accurate color is a key element that can transform clinical outcomes. Based on research and data, I strive to deliver better results through precision in color.
career: Expert in sensory science-based color experience research

Kenny.name: Euncheol Lee
Kenny.description: Reliable and stable software is the backbone of medical services. I code with a strong sense of responsibility in every line I write.
career: Completed KAIST AI Business Executive Program

Chul.name: Chul Namgoong
Chul.description: I design interfaces that bridge user experience with technology. I believe that even the smallest details can significantly improve efficiency and satisfaction in dentistry.
